name: AnimatedNftMaker
description: Animated NFT generator (Node.js + TypeScript). Weighted traits, direct frames, FFmpeg GIF/MP4, dual ETH/SOL metadata.

scripts.generate: npm run build && node dist/index.js generate
scripts.metadata: npm run build && node dist/index.js metadata
scripts.animate: npm run build && node dist/index.js animate
scripts.validate-layers: npm run build && node dist/index.js validate-layers
scripts.preview-traits: npm run build && node dist/index.js preview-traits
scripts.clean-output: npm run build && node dist/index.js clean-output
scripts.calculate-rarity: npm run build && node dist/index.js calculate-rarity
scripts.resume: npm run build && node dist/index.js resume
scripts.debug: npm run build && node dist/index.js debug
